verbs.description: [ARG1: religious freedom] [V: applies] [ARG2: to businesses] can you make money and be religious the obama administration and a few courts have said no at least in the context of forcing business owners to violate their religion by purchasing abortion - inducing drugs for their employees scouting animal products mark rienzi obama administration supreme court the becket fund for religious liberty starbucks chipotle
